message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value, potentially exceeding $1200000. While I can't disclose the exact details at this time, I'm confident it will be of great interest to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a limited-time offer, so please consider it carefully. If you're not interested, I have another buyer lined up who is willing to pay $1200000.
